name: Remove FRVR - Tap and Collapse
description:
Remove FRVR is a new collapsing block game where you have to tap groups of cubes of the same color to blast them before the blocks reach the top of the screen. Squeeze your brain and click wisely to obtain power ups that will help you to explode more blocks with a single move, and try to make combos to get more points! If you love to pop blocks, this is definitely your game!

Download now Remove FRVR for free and start collapsing blocks and blasting cubes! How many points can you get?

Take a look on the distribution of the pieces over the board, since you can click on a line of same-color pieces to transform them on a horizontal or vertical booster; you can also create a bomb power up by tapping four cubes in a square shape, and then pop it to blast all the surrounding blocks!

Play Remove FRVR and start getting fun as you train your brain! It's an absolutely addictive puzzle game! Click, pop and collapse the color blocks! Test your skills with color recognition and quick reactions. Start collapsing color cubes and try to empty the board before you are out of moves! The best block blasting game for free!

Target blocks in the same color and remove them from the playing field before they reach the top of the screen. Easy? Yes, but there's a catch! An element of speed is added to help you sharpen your reactions while you hone your color matching skills – Remove FRVR is a fun way to train your brain!

The more cubes you pop, the more points you get! Don’t let the color blocks reach the top of the screen! Tap on the dots at the bottom to spawn a line of cubes when you need one. Remove FRVR is a truly relaxing puzzle game where there’s no lives mode. If you can empty the board, you’ll save the moves that you haven’t spent for the next round! Keep your brain sharpen with hours of block bursting fun and cube popping! You just have to be careful not to fill up all the board!

Can you remove the same-color blocks before they reach the top of the screen? That's what Remove FRVR is all about – targeting grouped rows and columns of blocks in the same color. Each correct click scores points as it removes blocks from the playing field. Squeeze your brain and try to tap the blocks wisely, since you have limited movements to solve the puzzle!

More blocks keep entering the playing field from below, and the colors are gradually becoming more diverse. Does it seem like it's a bit difficult more to keep up? That's because the longer you play, the faster the pace. Remove FRVR adds an element of speed to the fun that helps you sharpen up reactions while honing your color recognition skills. It’s an easy to play but hard to master block collapsing game, enjoyable for the whole family, from kids to adults!

Remove FRVR is a low storage game, you don’t need more than 40 MB to play! This block blasting game only focuses on giving you a truly fun experience in a low mb game size for free. It’s an easy to play cube collapse game with incredibly simple and addictive controls, so both young and adults can have fun. Play online or offline, since you don’t need an internet connection to play this color blocks game. And relax, you can play as much as you want, there’s no time limit!
